short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buried in browser tabs? Auto-mute new tabs! Mute all tabs fast! Prevent annoying experiences from distracting you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buried in browser tabs? TechMadness is for you. This lightweight Chrome extension can do a lot, and doesn't ask for your money or your data.

Features:

1) Mute all tabs in the window with a flip of a switch
2) Auto-mute new tabs
3) Make the web your own by preventing distracting experiences

Features 1 and 2 are self-explanatory.

Feature 3 is amazing.

Let's say there's a chatbot that folks are using to make flishy flashy messages in your browser tabs. You find it distracting. You will never use it. Add a line to the resource list that includes the JavaScript filename or domain the offending script is coming from. Poof. Experience fixed.

Let's say you can't help but browse mainstream media sites, but they annoy the crap out of you by autoplaying video. Add a line to the resource list that includes the JavaScript filename or domain the offending script is coming from. Poof. Experience fixed.

Let's say another annoying thing on those mainstream media sites is their third-party content, what with all its inappropriate images and general obnoxiousness. Just add a line to the resource list that includes the JavaScript filename or domain the offending script is coming from. Poof. Experience fixed.

Recipes available on our website / Twitter feed.
